deity.name: Bane
deity.title: The Black Lord
deity.text: Bane is the evil god of war and conquest. Militaristic nations of humans and goblins serve him and conquer in his name. Evil fighters and paladins serve him. He commands hi worshipers to:
► Never allow your fear to gain mastery over you, but drive it into the hearts of your foes.
► Hone your skills to perfection, whether you are a mighty general or a lone mercenary.

power.title: Bane's Instructive Stratagem
power.fluff: Bane shows the clear path to victory to your allies, and punishes those who do not follow it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains a +1 power bonus to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

While the target has the bonus, if his or her first attack hits an enemy, that attack deals 2 extra damage. If the attack misses, he or she instead grants combat advantage until the end of his or her next turn.

power.title: Bane's Tactics
power.fluff: Your training and the strength of Bane allow you to strike with skill like no other

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can use one of your 1st-level at-will melee attack powers in place of your melee basic attack, and deal additional damage equal to your Strength modifier if you hit.
You can only target the creature that triggered the opportunity attack, even if the power could normally target more than one creature.

power.title: Bane's Tyrannical Transference
power.fluff: You call on Bane to transfer a hindrance to another - someone better suited to endure its consequences

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally in the burst becomes dazed, immobilized, stunned, or slowed

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, or an ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is affected by the triggering effect instead of the triggering creature.
This power does not affect any damage that might accompany the effect.
